content.prompt: Consider the relationship between various body parts and the size of their corresponding somatosensory cortex areas in the brain. How does a body part relate to the devoted cortical area?

choices.label: The larger the body part, the larger the area of the somatosensory cortex.
The closer the body part is to the brain, the smaller the area of the somatosensory cortex.
The closer the body part is to the trunk, the larger the area of the somatosensory cortex.
The more sensitive the body part, the larger the area of the somatosensory cortex.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
